title: Oxygen enriched porous carbon nanoflakes enable high-performance zinc ion hybrid capacitors
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00992D, Paper
Taiyu Cao, Chunliu Zhu, Xinyu Wang, Zhaowei Ji, Huanyu Liang, Jing Shi, Weiqian Tian, Jingwei Chen, Jingyi Wu, Huanlei Wang
A modified MgO template method with a chemical vapor deposition process is proposed to synthesize oxygen enriched porous carbon nanosheets (PCNs), which exhibit excellent electrochemical performance in zinc ion hybrid capacitors.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
